name: Orange Project Management Tool

screenshots.caption: All you need for projects in one place
Only what is important for PMs and Project Users

short_description:
Orange Project Management is a free tool that can help you manage all projects from a single point. You can install it on a web server, on your business network or even have Orange Project Management on your desktop. A simple yet powerful tool that is easy to use, easy to learn and can provide anything you need to have control, information and planning. 

We mainly build this tool for us, having checked a lot of tools around we have remove meaningless overhead functionality and we have add what really someone needs. 

Some of the features are:

-Unlimited Projects 
-Unlimited Project Tasks 
-Unlimited Project Works 
-Unlimited Project Users
-Issue Tracking (v1.3)
-User Roles for every Project 
-Multiple Project Resources Flags
-Team mailing system
-Internal Messaging System
-Automatic  PERT and GANTT charts
-Summary Page with all Projects Status 

and many more

Demo:  http://projectmanagement.gatory.com

Info: http://www.tecorange.com
summary: Orange Project Management is a Free Tool Web Project Management Tool
